Articles.Content:
hi it was working fine till i downloaded all the 'other packs' from this page http://www.kerbalspacerepository.com/list-of-all-content/

can any 1 tell me which i need to delete to get it working again

i moved all files into the parts file on kerbal left the excelsior ships out

In general you should pick and choose parts that you want, to improve load times and reduce the odds of exactly this problem. With that kind of part assault it could be that it\'s not even hung, just taking 24 hours or so to load.

If I\'ve misunderstood or it still hangs after reducing to a reasonable number of parts,

1. Open <KSP directory>/KSP_Data/output_log.txt .

2. Look for the last successfully loaded part. For convenient searching part loads, and only part loads, begin with '>> '.

3. I don\'t have any failures to work with; presumably there will either be an error message within the loading method, or the next part after the last successful one is the problem.

Yeah KSP takes longer to load the more you install add on parts. Start grabbing parts in small batches instead of loading up on every single add on you can get your hands on.

Hopefully with future versions of KSP, loading add ons will be more optimized.
You can also figure out which part is causing the problem in-game using alt + f2, which opens a debug console directly from the executable file that is open.
